title: Chad You
text:

If youâ€™ve found my blogs helpful and want to buy me a coffee or tea, feel free to contribute over at ko-fi.com/chadyou.

title: How to create a personal website using Quarto and Azure
text:
Here are the basics about how to create a personal website using Quarto and Azure.

Buy a domain on namecheap.com.
Create a website project using Quarto.
Publish your project to GitHub.
Create a static web app using Azure Static Web Apps.
Set up domain DNS in namecheap.com.

title: Population Health Curriculum
text:
The Robert Graham Center, HealthLandscape, American Board of Family Medicine, and Community Health Center, Inc.Â collaborated to develop this curriculum aimed to introduce health care professionals to population health concepts and tools. Resources include slides and note sets, three case studies with sample data, and a performance improvement activity.
